name: PaperMC
description: The PaperMC server software for Minecraft: Java Edition.

installScript.script: LATEST_VERSION=$(curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper | jq -r '.versions[-1]') && LATEST_BUILD=$(curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper/versions/$LATEST_VERSION | jq -r '.builds[-1]') && JAR_NAME=paper-$LATEST_VERSION-$LATEST_BUILD.jar && wget -O server.jar https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper/versions/$LATEST_VERSION/builds/$LATEST_BUILD/downloads/$JAR_NAME && echo "Downloaded PaperMC $LATEST_VERSION build $LATEST_BUILD as server.jar"
